36 using namespace std;
37 using namespace Mutation::Utilities::Config;
38 
39 namespace Mutation {
40  namespace GasSurfaceInteraction {
41 
42 class GSIReactionCatalysis : public GSIReaction
43 {
44 public:
45  GSIReactionCatalysis(ARGS args)
46  : GSIReaction(args)
47  {
48  assert(args.s_iter_reaction->tag() == "reaction");
49 
50  args.s_iter_reaction->getAttribute(
51  "formula", m_formula,
52  errorNoFormulainReaction());
53 
54  parseFormula(
55  args.s_thermo,
56  args.s_surf_state,
57  *(args.s_iter_reaction));
58 
59  const Mutation::Utilities::IO::XmlElement& node_rate_law =
60  *(args.s_iter_reaction->begin());
61 
62  DataGSIRateLaw data_gsi_rate_law = {
63  args.s_thermo,
64  args.s_transport,
65  node_rate_law,
66  m_reactants,
67  m_products };
68 
69  mp_rate_law = Factory<GSIRateLaw>::create(
70  node_rate_law.tag(), data_gsi_rate_law);
71 
72  if (mp_rate_law == NULL) {
73  args.s_iter_reaction->parseError(
74  "A rate law must be provided for this reaction!");
75  }
76 
77  // Check for charge and mass conservation
78  const size_t ne = args.s_thermo.nElements();
79  vector<int> v_sums(ne);
80  std::fill(v_sums.begin(), v_sums.end(), 0);
81  for (int ir = 0; ir < m_reactants.size(); ++ir)
82  for (int kr = 0; kr < ne; ++kr)
83  v_sums[kr] +=
84  args.s_thermo.elementMatrix()(m_reactants[ir],kr);
85  for (int ip = 0; ip < m_products.size(); ++ip)
86  for (int kp = 0; kp < ne; ++kp)
87  v_sums[kp] -=
88  args.s_thermo.elementMatrix()(m_products[ip],kp);
89  for (int i = 0; i < ne; ++i)
90  m_conserves &= (v_sums[i] == 0);
91 
92  if (m_conserves == false)
93  throw InvalidInputError("formula", m_formula)
94  << "Reaction " << m_formula
95  << " does not conserve charge or mass.";
96  }
97 
98 //==============================================================================
99  ~GSIReactionCatalysis(){
100  if (mp_rate_law != NULL){ delete mp_rate_law; }
101  }
102 
103 //==============================================================================
104  void parseSpecies(
105  std::vector<int>& species, std::vector<int>& species_surf,
106  std::string& str_chem_species,
107  const Mutation::Utilities::IO::XmlElement& node_reaction,
108  const Mutation::Thermodynamics::Thermodynamics& thermo,
109  const SurfaceState& surf_state)
110  {
111  // State-Machine states for parsing a species formula
112  enum ParseState {
113  coefficient,
114  name,
115  plus
116  } state = coefficient;
117 
118  size_t c = 0;
119  size_t s = 0;
120  size_t e = 0;
121  int nu = 1;
122  bool add_species = false;
123 
124  Mutation::Utilities::String::eraseAll(str_chem_species, " ");
125 
126  // Loop over every character
127  while (c != str_chem_species.size()) {
128  switch(state) {
129  case coefficient:
130  if (isdigit(str_chem_species[c])) {
131  nu = atoi(str_chem_species.substr(c, 1).c_str());
132  s = c + 1;
133  } else {
134  nu = 1;
135  s = c;
136  }
137  state = name;
138  break;
139  case name:
140  if (str_chem_species[c] == '+')
141  state = plus;
142  break;
143  case plus:
144  if (str_chem_species[c] != '+') {
145  e = c - 2;
146  c--;
147  add_species = true;
148  state = coefficient;
149  }
150  break;
151  }
152 
153  if (c == str_chem_species.size() - 1) {
154  add_species = true;
155  e = c;
156  }
157 
158  int index;
159  if (add_species) {
160  index = thermo.speciesIndex(
161  str_chem_species.substr(s, e-s+1));
162 
163  if(index == -1){
164  node_reaction.parseError((
165  "Species " + str_chem_species.substr(s, e-s+1)
166  + " is not in the mixture list or a species in the "
167  "wall phase!").c_str());
168  }
169 
170  species.push_back(index);
171  add_species = false;
172  }
173  c++;
174  }
175  std::sort(species.begin(), species.end());
176  }
177 };
178 
179 ObjectProvider<
180  GSIReactionCatalysis, GSIReaction>
181  catalysis_reaction("catalysis");
182 
183  } // namespace GasSurfaceInteraction
184 } // namespace Mutation
